remarks: A substitution is a function from ` E ` to ` E ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
msubff.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
msubff.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
msubff.s $e |- S = ( mSubst ` T ) $.
msubff.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
msubff $p |- ( T e. W -> S : ( R ^pm V ) --> ( E ^m E ) ) $.
